pillars_of_creation_43512507.jpg.title: Pillars of Creation
pillars_of_creation_43512507.jpg.description: Webb's near-infrared view of the iconic Pillars of Creation, where new stars are forming within dense clouds of gas and dust.

carina_nebula_6e6e8467.jpg.title: Carina Nebula
carina_nebula_6e6e8467.jpg.description: Webb's detailed view of the Carina Nebula revealing new features in this vast star-forming region.

southern_ring_nebula_30427bd7.jpg.title: Southern Ring Nebula
southern_ring_nebula_30427bd7.jpg.description: Webb's infrared vision showing the Southern Ring Nebula, a planetary nebula created by a dying star.

deep_field_smacs_0723_e1985533.jpg.title: Deep Field SMACS 0723
deep_field_smacs_0723_e1985533.jpg.description: Webb's deepest and sharpest infrared image of the distant universe to date, showing galaxy cluster SMACS 0723.

cartwheel_galaxy_1944967d.jpg.title: Cartwheel Galaxy
cartwheel_galaxy_1944967d.jpg.description: Webb's detailed image of the Cartwheel Galaxy, a rare ring galaxy formed by a collision between two galaxies.
